organic.title: Gastroenterology and Hepatology - UW Pediatrics
organic.snippet: Our research programs center on the diagnosis, treatment, and quality of life of children and adolescents with gastrointestinal and liver diseases.

organic.title: Gastroenterology Fellowship - UW Pediatrics
organic.snippet: We are an academic pediatric gastroenterology group with a strong international reputation for high quality research, education and patient care.
